title: How do I discern my phone status from status indicator?
answer:
ƒÜ When the indicator blinks red, the battery level is low.
ƒÜ When the indicator blinks green, you have a new message or missed call.
ƒÜ When your phone is charging:
. Steady red: The battery level is low.
. Steady yellow: The battery level is medium.
. Steady green: The battery level is higher than 90%.
